page.title: 19Changing Times
page.content: Darfield is a very close community and many families have lived here for generations. When asked their reasons for staying people usually said it was because the village is friendly and sociable. The changes that have taken place here have been in the form of improved transport and new construction. In recent years new estates have been built. Most of the older people in Darfield can remember the coronation and the V E Day celebrations, of street parties. In general the older residents think there has been an increase in vandalism, also they are aware of a decline in manners, respect for elders and property. However despite this they all say they would never consider moving.
